# Overview

plot points

# Packages 

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

# Data



```{r}
geeTwi = read.csv("../data/PointTerrain/AllFieldTWI.csv")
```

# Look at the table
```{r}
head(geeTwi)
```
# Dropp -9999
```{r}
(
  geeTwi1 = geeTwi %>%
    filter(moisture != -9999)
)
```

# Figures
```{r}
(
  g1_twi = ggplot(data = geeTwi1, aes(x=as.character(moisture), y=twi)) +
    geom_boxplot() +
    geom_jitter(aes(color=ecoregion), size=0.4, alpha=0.9)+
    labs(x="Soil moisture", 
         y="TWI",
         subtitle = "Topographic Wetness Index")
  
)
```

```{r}
ggsave("../figures/Boxplots/AllFieldTWI.jpeg", plot = g1_twi,  dpi = 300)
```

# Figures
```{r}
(
  g2_twi = ggplot(data = geeTwi1, aes(x=as.character(moisture), y=twi)) +
    geom_boxplot() +
    geom_jitter(color="black", size=0.4, alpha=0.9) +
    facet_wrap(~ecoregion) +
    labs(x="Soil moisture", 
         y="TWI",
         subtitle = "Topographic Wetness Index")
  
)
```

```{r}
ggsave("../figures/Boxplots/AllFieldTWIbyEcoregion.jpeg", plot = g2_twi,  dpi = 300)
```
